Articles.Content:
Do you want to upload craft? For some, Mediafire and Dropbox crafts fail to work. KerbalX is made to work with all KSP users.

Now, you can post craft on KerbalX!

Just use this username: [h=4]KSP Community (open)[/h]

And this password:

[h=4]kspforums[/h]

Have fun, and I hope this becomes official!

Anyone can post a craft!
U know ive been meaning to develop kerbalcentral.com as an alternative ksp community, linking and listing alt ksp sites like yours.

U know ive been meaning to develop kerbalcentral.com as an alternative ksp community, linking and listing alt ksp sites like yours.

Alright, go ahead!

Do you want to upload craft? For some, Mediafire and Dropbox crafts fail to work. KerbalX is made to work with all KSP users.

Now, you can post craft on KerbalX!

-snip-

That's a good idea! Thank you, I'm just hoping no one logs onto there and deletes the uploaded craft files, but I don't think that the KSP Community has people like that

U know ive been meaning to develop kerbalcentral.com as an alternative ksp community, linking and listing alt ksp sites like yours.

Great idea! So you are planning to provide a "stream" where all new posts like KSP videos, popular Forum posts etc. will be put together in one place? That would be great!
